title: Preventing Spread Of Respiratory Viruses When You'Re Sick
content:
Your symptoms are getting better overall,
and
You have not had a fever (and are not using fever-reducing medication).
When you go back to your normal activities, take added precaution over the next 5 days, such as taking additional
steps for cleaner air
,
hygiene,
masks
,
physical distancing
, and/or
testing
when you will be around other people indoors. This is especially important to protect people with factors that increase their risk of severe illness from respiratory viruses.
